de.esoco.gwt.shared

Interface StorageService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AuthenticatedService, CommandService, com.google.gwt.user.client.rpc.RemoteService
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    GwtApplicationService, ProcessService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GwtApplicationServiceImpl, ProcessServiceImpl, StorageServiceImpl

    public interface StorageService
extends AuthenticatedService
    Base interface for services that are based on persistent objects from a storage and/or for messages on a mail server.

      • QUERY

        static final Command<de.esoco.data.element.StringDataElement,de.esoco.data.element.QueryResultElement<de.esoco.lib.model.DataModel<java.lang.String>>> QUERY
        A command that executes a query on a database storage or on a mail server. If the query yields less elements than defined by the given limit the resulting array will contain fewer elements than requested and may even be empty. The argument to the query command is a data element named with the query key and containing the following properties from StorageProperties (elements with a default value are optional):
        • StorageProperties.QUERY_START: The index of the first element to return (zero-based)
        • StorageProperties.QUERY_LIMIT: The maximum number of elements to return.
        • StorageProperties.QUERY_DEPTH: The maximum depth up to which child entities shall be read (Default: 0).
        • StorageProperties.QUERY_SEARCH: Must be a StringMapDataElement that contains a mapping from column IDs to search constraints as defined for the method FilterableDataModel.getFilter(String) (Default: null, i.e. no search constraints).
        • StorageProperties.QUERY_SORT: A mapping from column IDs to a SortDirection (Default: null, i.e. no specific sorting).

        This command returns a QueryResultElement that contains string DataModels that represent the queried rows. The string values in the row models contain the queried column values.

      • PREPARE_DOWNLOAD

        static final Command<de.esoco.data.element.StringDataElement,de.esoco.data.element.StringDataElement> PREPARE_DOWNLOAD
        A command to prepare the download of data for a certain storage query. The input argument is the exactly the same data element as that of the QUERY command. An additional property with the name ContentProperties.FILE_NAME can be set to pre-set a file name of the prepared download.

        The command return value is a string data element containing the relative download URL for the generated data.
